pkgmetadata.longdescription: - **aisaratuners is an open-source optimization library to automate and expedite hyperparameter search. aisaratuners has two modules, aisara_general_tuner.py which is a framework agnostic, and aisara_keras_tuner.py which is tailored for Karas API.**- **aisaratuners leverages AiSara algorithm, Latin hypercube sampling, and the concept of search space reduction for fast reach of the optimum hyperparameters.**Change Log==========1.4.9 (19/11/2020)1.5.2 (20/1/2022)-------------------
